description: This script helps to manipulate json files in various ways.

input_file.title: Input file
input_file.description: One file to convert. Enter NULL with -add_json to create new json file.

txt2json.title: TXT to JSON
txt2json.description: Convert from ':' separated text file to json formatted file.

json2txt.title: JSON to TXT
json2txt.description: Convert from json formatted file to ':' separated text file.

add_json.title: Add JSON
add_json.description: Add an attribute to the end of the specified json file.

del_json.title: Delete JSON
del_json.description: Remove attribute (KEY) from the -input json file.

force_add.title: Force add
force_add.description: Use with -add_json to overwrite an existing attribute in the specified json file.

overwrite.title: Overwrite
overwrite.description: Use caution as this will overwrite the -prefix file if it exists!!

delimiter_major.title: Major Delimiter
delimiter_major.description: Specify the new (major) delimiter to separate keys and values when using '-txt2json' opt.

delimiter_minor.title: Minor Delimiter
delimiter_minor.description: Specify the new (minor) delimiter to separate value items when using '-txt2json' opt.

literal_keys.title: Literal Keys
literal_keys.description: Do not replace spaces with '_', nor parentheses and brackets with ''.

values_stay_str.title: Values Stay String
values_stay_str.description: Each numeric or str item gets saved as a str; otherwise, guess at int and float.
